item.title: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）在竞争对手缩减可再生能源投资之际实现电力盈利
item.description:
这家法国大型企业增加清洁能源和燃气生产的战略正在取得成效。【原文：

The French major’s strategy of adding both clean sources and gas-fired production is paying off.

】

item.title: 埃克萨罗公司停职首席执行官曾瓦因受到指控而辞职
item.description: 南非煤炭生产商埃克萨罗资源有限公司（Exxaro Resources Ltd.）被停职的首席执行官因处理对其行为指控的调查而辞职。【原文：The suspended chief executive officer of South African coal producer Exxaro Resources Ltd. resigned over the handling of a probe into allegations over her conduct.】

item.title: 芬兰拟立法禁止俄罗斯人购买房地产
item.description: 在与邻国俄罗斯有关联的房地产交易引发安全担忧之后，芬兰正在推进其阻止一些外国公民购买房产的计划。【原文：Finland is moving ahead with its plan to stop property purchases by some foreign nationals after security concerns surfaced over such deals with links to neighboring Russia.】

item.title: 市场加大对英国央行宽松政策的押注，无视该行的鹰派言论
item.description: 在英国央行决策者如期将借贷成本下调四分之一个百分点后，交易商加大了对英国央行今年进一步降息的押注；其中两位决策者投票支持更大幅度的降息。【原文：Traders upped bets for further UK interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England this year after policymakers lowered borrowing costs by a quarter point as expected — with two policymakers voting for a bigger reduction.】

item.title: 在欧洲等待国防计划之际，硅谷向 "致命 "技术倾斜
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，马克-伯根（Mark Bergen）问道，安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）对特朗普世界的追求对欧洲意味着什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.description: 我是纽约的经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们关注美国就业报告。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, an economics editor in New York. item.title: 北爱尔兰担心跨大西洋贸易战的影响
item.description: 北爱尔兰在脱欧后似乎获得了两全其美的结果：既能顺利地与英国开展贸易，又能顺利地与其前合作伙伴欧盟开展贸易。【原文：Northern Ireland emerged from Brexit seemingly with the best of both worlds — smooth access to trade with Britain as well as its ex-partner, the European Union.】

item.title: 英格兰银行发出鹰派警告，将利率降至 4.5%
item.description: 英国央行货币政策委员会投票决定将利率降至 19 个月以来的最低点，但发出了鹰派的信号，表示只需再降息两次，就能使通胀率回到 2% 的目标。【原文：The Bank of England’s Monetary Policy Committee voted to cut interest rates to a 19-month low but struck a hawkish tone by signaling that only two more reductions are needed to bring inflation back to the 2% target.】

item.title: 布雷万-霍华德公司中东地区首席执行官拉希尼据说将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）中东地区首席执行官 Oualid Lahsini 在任职两年后即将离职。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management’s chief executive officer in the Middle East, Oualid Lahsini, is leaving after two years in the role, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果特朗普发动贸易战，加拿大人支持以石油为武器
item.description: 一项新的民意调查显示，加拿大人在全国范围内强烈支持在必要时对石油运输征收出口税，以报复美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税。【原文：There is strong nationwide support among Canadians for putting export taxes on oil shipments if needed to retaliate against US President Donald Trump’s tariffs, a new poll suggests.】

item.title: 和平计划预期升温，乌克兰债券延续涨势
item.description: 乌克兰的美元债券连续第五天攀升，创下新高，因为人们对下周将出现终战协议细节的预期不断升温。【原文：Ukraine’s dollar bonds climbed for a fifth day, hitting new highs amid rising expectations that details of a war-ending deal will emerge next week.】

item.title: DeepSeek 限制访问人工智能模型，因为需求使能力捉襟见肘
item.description: DeepSeek 是一家中国初创公司，其人工智能模型上周在全球市场掀起轩然大波，该公司表示，由于服务器容量不足，将限制用户访问其应用程序编程接口服务。【原文：DeepSeek, the Chinese startup whose artificial-intelligence model roiled global markets last week, said it would restrict access to its application programming interface service because of shortages with its server capacity.】

item.title: 华纳音乐公司以 4.5 亿美元收购布鲁诺-马尔斯和阿黛尔的歌曲
item.description: 华纳音乐集团收购了 Tempo Music 公司的控股权，该公司拥有布鲁诺-马尔斯（Bruno Mars）、阿黛尔（Adele）和维兹-卡利法（Wiz Khalifa）的歌曲版权目录。【原文：Warner Music Group has acquired a controlling stake in Tempo Music, the owner of a catalog of song rights spanning recordings by Bruno Mars, Adele and Wiz Khalifa.】

item.title: Vertical Aerospace 筹集 9000 万美元后将寻求更多资金
item.description: Vertical Aerospace Ltd. 计划在刚刚结束的一轮融资后筹集更多资金，这家英国初创公司的目标是在 2028 年之前对其电池供电的空中出租车进行认证。【原文：Vertical Aerospace Ltd. plans to raise more money following a just-concluded round, as the UK startup targets certification of its battery-powered air taxi by 2028.】

item.title: Pimco 从特朗普引发的债券波动中看到机会
item.description: 尽管投资者对唐纳德-特朗普的不可预测性耿耿于怀，但值得注意的是，市场波动会创造各种机会；如果你看中的资产价格过高，那么你可能只差特朗普的一条推特就能获得买入机会。【原文：For all investors’ handwringing over Donald Trump’s unpredictability, it’s worth keeping in mind that market volatility creates all sorts of opportunities — if an asset you’re eyeing is too expensive, you may be just a Trump tweet away from a buying opportunity.】

item.title: Bharti Airtel 的净利润出人意料，一次性收益使净利润激增六倍
item.description: Bharti Airtel Ltd. 公布的季度利润高于预期，主要得益于一次性收益和 7 月份收取的较高用户费。【原文：Bharti Airtel Ltd. reported a larger-than-expected quarterly profit, boosted mostly by one-time gains and the higher user fees it imposed in July.】

item.title: 2024 年水泥销量下降后，Cemex 预计美国需求将复苏
item.description: 墨西哥水泥公司（Cemex SAB）认为，在 2024 年销售量下降之后，今年美国这个最大市场对其水泥的需求将有所改善。【原文：Mexico’s Cemex SAB sees demand for its cement improving this year in the US, its largest market, after lower volumes dented sales for 2024.】

item.title: Realtor.com 离开加利福尼亚州，将总部设在得克萨斯州
item.description: Realtor.com 也加入了从加利福尼亚州迁往德克萨斯州的公司行列。【原文：Realtor.com is joining the ranks of companies leaving California for Texas.】

item.title: 美国就业人数将减少，但幅度不会像人们担心的那样大
item.description: 即将对美国就业增长进行的修正将是实质性的，但可能没有最初估计的那么糟糕，这凸显出劳动力市场正在逐渐降温。【原文：An upcoming revision to US job growth will be substantial but probably not as bad as initially estimated, underscoring a labor market that’s gradually cooling.】

item.title: 南非橄榄球联盟将任命财务健康顾问
item.description: 负责监管橄榄球世界卫冕冠军南非 Springboks 队的机构将任命一名独立顾问来审查这项运动的财务生态系统。【原文：The body that oversees the reigning rugby-union world champions, South Africa’s Springboks, will appoint an independent adviser to review the sport’s financial ecosystem.】

item.title: 乌干达中央银行因通胀风险谨慎维持利率不变
item.description: 乌干达中央银行连续第二次维持基准利率不变，因为通胀前景面临的风险在增加。【原文：Uganda’s central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged for a second time in a row as risks to its inflation outlook grow.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算需要在微软、Alphabet失利后有所作为
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）股价的攀升主要得益于两个趋势：云计算业务的强劲表现和对成本的关注。现在，这两点都可能成为问题。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. shares have largely climbed on the back of two trends: strength in its cloud business and a focus on costs. Now both could be in question.】

item.title: 汇丰银行亚太区全球银行业务主管即将离职
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司亚太区全球银行业务主管马蔚华（Christina Ma）即将离职，因为该银行正在重组业务以控制成本。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s head of global banking for Asia Pacific, Christina Ma, is leaving the bank, according to people familiar with matter, as the lender restructures its business to keep a lid on costs.】

item.title: 不可阻挡的散户人群打破股票购买记录，尽管股价下跌
item.description: 今年年初的波动令一些专业投资者感到恐慌，但却丝毫没有削弱散户对美国股市和所谓 "华丽七雄 "公司的热情。【原文：The volatile start to the year has spooked some professional investors but has done little to dowse retail traders’ enthusiasm for the US stock market and the so-called Magnificent 7 companies.】

item.title: 赢得债券持有人支持后，厄瓜多尔总统期待选民支持其连任
item.description: 当丹尼尔-诺沃亚成为厄瓜多尔历史上最年轻的当选总统时，他承诺要以一种紧迫感来应对犯罪和财政双重危机。不过，他最大的胜利可能是战胜了华尔街。【原文：When he became the youngest president to be elected in Ecuador’s history, Daniel Noboa promised to attack twin crime and fiscal crises with a sense of urgency. His biggest victory, though, may have been with Wall Street.】

item.title: 特朗普关税如何影响购物者的快递服务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的新规定有可能颠覆物流公司从中国卖家向美国买家运送小包裹的蓬勃发展业务，物流公司正争先恐后地适应新规定。【原文：Logistics firms are scrambling to adjust to President Donald Trump’s new rules that threaten to upend their booming business delivering small parcels from Chinese sellers to American buyers.】

item.title: 分析师称瑞银瑞士资本的冲击可能会逐步显现
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Switzerland will probably take a gradual approach to implementing new capital regulations that UBS Group AG has warned could affect its payouts and the country’s economy, according to analysts at Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司再次绕过乌克兰向斯洛伐克输送天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）开始通过土耳其天然气管道（TurkStream）向斯洛伐克输送天然气，这缓解了经乌克兰输送的天然气被切断一个月后的一些供应担忧。【原文：Russia’s Gazprom PJSC started sending gas to Slovakia through the TurkStream pipeline, easing some supply concerns a month after flows via Ukraine were cut off.】

item.title: 随着经济增长和通胀放缓，墨西哥银行可能会加快减税步伐
item.description: 墨西哥央行周四可能将加倍放宽货币政策，在通胀率回到目标区间、经济增长放缓和关税推迟的情况下将利率下调半个百分点。【原文：Mexico’s central bank will likely double the pace of monetary policy easing Thursday, delivering a half-point rate cut with inflation back in the target range, growth slowing and tariffs delayed.】

item.title: 印尼停止在特朗普高尔夫球场所在特区施工
item.description: 印度尼西亚政府已经停止了一个经济特区的建设工程，该经济特区内有一个唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）品牌的豪华高尔夫球场，原因是该球场违反了环保规定。【原文：The Indonesian government has halted construction works in a special economic zone that hosts a Donald Trump-branded luxury golf course due to environmental violations.】
